sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Update ui_parameters reference_qual of grouped input dictionary to use a script include to dynamically change it so that only QR/Barcodes can be added.</description>
        <name>Limit UI Params in Grouped Input</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	
	var sysDictionaryGr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sysDictionaryGr.addQuery("name", "sys_sg_grouped_input");
	sysDictionaryGr.addQuery("element", "ui_parameters");
	sysDictionaryGr.query();
	
	if(sysDictionaryGr.next()) {
		sysDictionaryGr.setValue("reference_qual", "javascript:new SgReferenceQualifiers().getGroupedInputReferenceQualifier();");
		sysDictionaryGr.update();
	}
})();
        ]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-11-01 21:27:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>257eb12af7300010f6d1aabe048dffbe</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Limit UI Params in Grouped Input</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_257eb12af7300010f6d1aabe048dffbe</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-11-01 21:55:00</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Limit UI Params in Grouped Input
